Package ons

Class EONLink

java.lang.Object
ons.Link
ons.EONLink
public class EONLink
extends Link
The Elastic Optical Network (EON) Link represents a Fiberlink in an optical network divided by slots.

  • Field Summary

      if it is true, false otherwise
